sent.orig: We ate sausage, and washed it down with a whisky.
Would you like a cup of malt whisky?
sent.trans: 你想喝杯麦芽威士忌吗？

sent.orig: Come on. have a whisky-it'll make a man of you!
sent.trans: 来。喝一杯威士忌酒--这会使你成熟。老练。

sent.orig: The noun Scots refers to the Scottish dialect of the English language and Scotch is whisky.
sent.trans: scots作名词时，指英语中的苏格兰方言或称苏格兰英语；Scotch则专指苏格兰威士忌。

sent.orig: She drank the neat whisky from the flask and shuddered a little when she swallowed.
sent.trans: 她从扁瓶里喝了口纯威士忌，咽的时候哆嗦了一下。
